study_focus.title: Deep Focus Study Session
study_focus.description: Complete a 45-minute focused study session without distractions. Use the Pomodoro technique and take notes.

review_notes.title: Review Yesterday's Notes
review_notes.description: Go through your notes from yesterday and create a summary of key points. Highlight important concepts.

organize_materials.title: Organize Study Materials
organize_materials.description: Clean and organize your study space, digital files, and physical materials. Create folders for different subjects.

practice_problems.title: Solve 3 Practice Problems
practice_problems.description: Work through 3 challenging problems in your most difficult subject. Show all work and check answers.

read_chapter.title: Read One Chapter
read_chapter.description: Read and take notes on one chapter from your current textbook. Create a mind map of key concepts.

skill_development.title: Learn Something New
skill_development.description: Spend 30 minutes learning a new skill related to your career through online courses, articles, or tutorials.

networking.title: Connect with One Professional
networking.description: Reach out to someone in your industry on LinkedIn or send a professional email. Build your network.

organize_workspace.title: Optimize Your Workspace
organize_workspace.description: Clean and organize your physical and digital workspace. Update your task management system.

industry_news.title: Read Industry News
industry_news.description: Read 2-3 articles about trends and developments in your industry. Take notes on key insights.

side_project.title: Work on Side Project
side_project.description: Spend 45 minutes working on a personal project that showcases your skills or explores new technologies.

meditation.title: Morning Meditation
meditation.description: Practice mindfulness meditation for 10 minutes. Focus on your breathing and set intentions for [today].

gratitude_journal.title: Write 3 Things You're Grateful For
gratitude_journal.description: Write down three things you're grateful for today and reflect on why they matter to you.

physical_exercise.title: 20-Minute Exercise
physical_exercise.description: Do 20 minutes of physical exercise - walking, stretching, workout, or any movement that energizes you.

read_personal_dev.title: Read Personal Development
read_personal_dev.description: Read 15 minutes from a personal development book or listen to an inspiring podcast episode.

declutter_space.title: Declutter One Area
declutter_space.description: Choose one small area (desk, drawer, digital folder) and organize it completely. Donate or discard what you don't need.

digital_detox.title: 30-Minute Digital Detox
digital_detox.description: Put away all devices for 30 minutes and do something analog - draw, write, walk, or have a real conversation.

plan_tomorrow.title: Plan Tomorrow's Tasks
plan_tomorrow.description: Review your calendar and create a prioritized task list for tomorrow. Set realistic goals and time blocks.

review_goals.title: Weekly Goal Review
review_goals.description: Review your weekly goals and assess progress. Adjust plans if needed and celebrate completed milestones.

clean_emails.title: Inbox Zero Challenge
clean_emails.description: Process all emails in your inbox. Reply, file, or delete each one. Unsubscribe from unnecessary lists.

update_calendar.title: Calendar Maintenance
update_calendar.description: Review and update your calendar for the next week. Add important deadlines and block time for focused work.

organize_files.title: Digital File Organization
organize_files.description: Organize files on your computer or cloud storage. Create logical folder structures and delete duplicates.

backup_important.title: Backup Important Data
backup_important.description: Backup important files, photos, and documents. Update your backup system and verify data integrity.

hydration_reminder.title: Drink 3 Glasses of Water
hydration_reminder.description: Stay hydrated by drinking at least 3 glasses of water throughout [today]. Your body will thank you!

compliment_someone.title: Give Someone a Genuine Compliment
compliment_someone.description: Brighten someone's day by giving them a sincere compliment. It could be a friend, family member, or colleague.

tidy_space.title: 5-Minute Tidy Up
tidy_space.description: Spend 5 minutes tidying up your immediate surroundings. Put things back where they belong.

learn_fact.title: Learn One Interesting Fact
learn_fact.description: Discover and remember one interesting fact about the world, science, history, or any topic that fascinates you.

call_loved_one.title: Call a Friend or Family Member
call_loved_one.description: Reach out to someone you care about and have a meaningful conversation. Strengthen your relationships.
